email.title: DoCSoc Weekly Digest
email.text:
Hi everyone!
We're well and truly into preparations for IC Hack 25 so no social this week. If you didn't get a ticket to IC Hack we still have opportunities to attend though.
email.heading: IC Hack Meme sticker competition
email.text:
Enter the IC Hack sticker competition for a chance to win a ticket to IC Hack!
Rules Deadline: Midnight on Monday 20th January Submission: Email your design to ichack@ic.ac.uk as an SVG (preferred) or a high resolution PNG Max size: 50x50mm (can be any shape)
we recommend stickers primarily with the IC Hack logo, with memes in the background/around it.
Here's some examples from IC Hacks 20 and 22 years:

Find some assets to use [here](https://drive.google.com/drive/u/1/folders/1Jdu7O4LxnUzK9EXMsMzLxZOEVzp7FbX_)!
The best designs will be printed and given to participants them at the event.
email.heading: IC Hack Volunteer Briefing

event.text:
Didn't get a ticket for IC Hack 25 but still want to be there? Then make sure to come to the volunteer briefing. There won't be any other opportunities to sign up, so make sure to be there.
Being an IC Hack volunteer also comes with many benefitsâ€”you'll get free swag, food, and experience behind the scenes of Europe's largest student-run hackathon. Don't miss out on this opportunity!

email.text:
This will be here, at the bottom of all our digests from now on. Feel free to speak your mind regarding events DoCSoc have been running so far, and also about DoCSoc in general.
Please find the link [here](https://forms.gle/WHU127UYv8dd5zGVA)
Individual survey results will be kept private.
